skill.name: string-database
skill.description: Query STRING API for protein-protein interactions (59M proteins, 20B interactions). Network analysis, GO/KEGG enrichment, interaction discovery, 5000+ species, for systems biology.
skill.summary: Query STRING API for protein-protein interactions (59M proteins, 20B interactions). Network analysis...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The code makes direct HTTPS requests to string-db.org for documented API endpoints. No sensitive file access, environment harvesting, or code execution patterns were found.

content.value_statement: You need reliable protein interaction data across species. This skill retrieves STRING networks, enrichment, and images with simple Python calls.
actual_capabilities: Map protein or gene identifiers to STRING IDs
Fetch interaction networks as TSV data
Retrieve network images as PNG bytes
List interaction partners with confidence filters
Run functional enrichment across GO and KEGG
Get PPI enrichment statistics and STRING version
limitations: Rate limits and server availability affect results
Outputs are raw TSV or JSON that need parsing
No built in plotting beyond PNG image retrieval

use_cases.title: Explore a protein network
use_cases.description: Map a gene list and view high confidence interactions for a specific pathway.

use_cases.title: Run enrichment analysis
use_cases.description: Submit protein lists and review GO and KEGG terms with FDR filtering.

use_cases.title: Compare species networks
use_cases.description: Fetch networks for the same gene across species using taxon identifiers.

prompt_templates.title: Map identifiers
prompt_templates.scenario: Convert gene names to STRING IDs
prompt_templates.prompt: Map these identifiers to STRING IDs for human: TP53, BRCA1, MDM2.

prompt_templates.title: Get interaction network
prompt_templates.prompt: Fetch a STRING network for TP53 and BRCA1 with required score 400.

prompt_templates.title: Run enrichment
prompt_templates.scenario: Analyze a protein list for pathways
prompt_templates.prompt: Run enrichment for TP53, BRCA1, ATM, CHEK2 in human and summarize top terms.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced network workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a TP53 network with add_nodes 5, then run PPI enrichment and report p value.

output_examples.input: Get top interaction partners for TP53 with high confidence
output: Top partners include MDM2, ATM, and CHEK2
Each row includes scores by evidence channel

best_practices: Specify species for lists larger than ten proteins
Use versioned URLs for reproducible results
anti_patterns: Assuming results are curated without validation

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: The helper functions are Python based and work with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: What are the query limits?
faq.answer: STRING recommends pacing requests and splitting large lists to avoid timeouts.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the functions return TSV or JSON that you can parse in Python or other tools.

faq.question: Does this access my local files?
faq.answer: No, the code only sends API requests to string-db.org and does not read local files.

faq.question: What should I do if I get empty results?
faq.answer: Check species, map identifiers first, and lower the required_score threshold.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual API calls?
faq.answer: It wraps the same endpoints with consistent parameters and error handling.
